transcript.name: t1
transcript.comment: This transcript is identical to the RefSeq transcript NM_001037.4 but with the polyA tail removed.
The coding sequence of this transcript is identical to the coding sequence of Ensembl transcript ENST00000262631.10. The two transcripts differ at the 5'UTR.
